projects.title: My Projects
projects.delete_project_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This will remove the project, all conversations and attachments. This action cannot be undone.
projects.collaborate_with_ai: A new project where you will collaborate with AI.
projects.modify_settings: Modify your assistant's settings and behavior.
projects.personality_placeholder: Describe the assistant's personality and what it is supposed to do. This will directly affect how it behaves and performs.
projects.delete_assistant_confirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your assistant and remove all of its data from our servers.

sidebar.upload_files_websites: Upload files and websites for AI to remember
sidebar.delete_folder_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? All files inside will be moved to the root directory.

file_upload.website_description: Upload a website that you want the AI Assistant to remember.

file_upload.contact_enterprise: If needed, contact us about an enterprise solution.
file_upload.unsupported_files_desc: Some files were skipped because they are not supported.
file_upload.max_100mb: Max. 100 MB. Drag and drop or click to browse
file_upload.invalid_urls_desc: Some URLs are invalid. Please check and try again.
file_upload.error_scraping_desc: Something went wrong while scraping the websites. Please try again.

kanban.delete_board_warning: This action is irreversible. The board and all its data will be permanently deleted.
kanban.board_name_to_confirm: Type the board name to confirm deletion

file_preview.no_data_in_pdf: No data found in the PDF file.
file_preview.displaying_text_instead: Displaying extracted text content instead. Highlighting may be limited.
file_preview.failed_to_fetch: Failed to fetch file for download
file_preview.no_citations_found_in_document: No citations found in the document
file_preview.could_not_locate: Could not locate the citations in the document
